item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 16th July
item.description:
Please pass to relevant ahr covering this area. Sign post on footway is leaning. Post is rusted near base but has not created any holes nor is the post moving in its foundations. It is creating a slight obstruction in the footway but not significant safety risk at this time. Please consider removal and replacement of leaning sign post.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Fence along footpath next to school has collapsed, 16th July

On footpath next to school

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 16th July
item.description:
I understand from a neighbour the tree was diseased hence it's removal recently July 2025, can I ask if there are plans to replace it please? If so can I ask if it is to be similar tree to that which was removed? I am happy to contribute to a replacement.
Report on FixMyStreet
